history.title: My Story
paragraphs: In 2020, I started in the tech industry. I have worked for major companies such as Merlin Properties, Airbus Defence And Space, and Codere NEWCO. I have always held positions as a frontend or hybrid application developer. However, I have done a bit of everything: hybrid applications, setting up servers, automation scripts, backends...
I am just a regular person with a regular story. I enjoy computing, music, and fitness. I have always been creative, analytical, and a bit restless.

In 2025, my goal is to publish my own applications and monetize them. In fact, I have a fitness app that is about to launch... What I am sure of is that one day I will be able to make a living from my own software without depending on third-party companies.
Freedom is within reach of any programmer, as many before have proven. You just have to seize it.

skills.title: My Skills
description: My main expertise is software development, focused on web development and hybrid applications. However, I am fully capable of developing any other type of software if necessary: process automation, backend, CMS...
